ing: 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
des: "An excellent, refreshing salad discovered one hot summer day. If you're tired, hot, or just need a little spice in your life, it won't take more than fifteen minutes to create this classic pick-me-up."
ins: Stir the Dijon mustard, dill, green onion, Cheddar cheese, corn, peas, and edamame in a bowl until evenly combined. Stir in the iceberg lettuce, season to taste with salt and pepper, and toss to mix.
